content: Onnaam shushroosha
Pattakkaaran:- shubaholaabo.........
Janam: - balaheenarum paapikallumaaya........
Praarambhapraarththhana

Kartthaave! Kashdathakallum duഃkhangallum niranya ee lokatthilninnu verpirinyu yaathrayaayi vidoorasthhamaayittheernnirikkunna ee aathmaav, aashvaasavum aanandavum niranyathaaya sthhalangallilekku ninte vishuddha maalaakhamaaraal nayikkappeduvaanum punaruththhaanadivasamvare avide aanandamanubhavichu pithrputhraparishuddhaathmaavaaya ninne mukhaprasannathayodukoode abhimukheekarikkuvaanum idayaakaname. Hosho.......
(eniyono- kaadeeshodashreeshkintthe)

Aadaam makkallkkuththhaanam
Vaagdattham che-ython mashihaa!
Nin sharanatthil nidritharaam
Bhaktharkkarullanamu-ththha-aanam

Thaalkkaalikamaam-vaasatthee-
Nnadiyaane nee-kkiya mashihaa!
Kanivodu kaikkollllanamivane
vidhiyathilettaruthe-naathhaa!

Vellivaayellaam-thrkkannaal
Kaanum mashihaa-raajaave!
Nin mahimodayadivasatthil
Ivanude kara vellivaa-kka-lle.

Nin sharanatthil-nidrithanaam
daasanu mashihaa-smrthi nalki
Nin mahimodayadivasatthil
Valabhaagatthaayu che-rkke-nam.

Svargakavaadam-bhedikkum
parudeesin thaa-kkol mashihaa!
Thava sharane mrthanaam daasa
Nnanpaal vaathil thura-kke-na-me.

Povuka sahajaa!-karayaruthe
Naathhan prabhayil-paarppikkum
Vazhi kaanikkum parudeesin
Kaaval krobe maa-laa-khaa.

Mrthalokattheennum - laasar
Kkuththhaanam na-lkiya naadam
Kabarathil ninnum ninne villi-
Chetteedum paru-dee-saa-yil.

Mashihaa nrpathe!- srshdipathe
Sarvva rahasyam - kaanmone!
Naathhaa! Krpayaal nyangalle nin
chirakin maravil cherkke-name

Nin sharanatthil-nin krpayil
nidrithanaamee-sodarane
Ninnaagamanapperunnaallil
Nin krpa nerittee-de-nam
Baarekmor. Shubaho ... Menaolam

Janakaathmaja paa-vana roohaa!
Sathyakeshaa!-kalppanayaal
Vaangiyoraathmaavangeykkaay
vandanavum sthuthiyum-na-lkum.

items.content: Kaarunyavaanaaya daivame! Ninnil abhayam praapichukondu ninte karthrkalpanaprakaaram ivideninnu yaathrayaayirikkunna ee aathmaavinuvendi nyangall apekshikkunnu. Kartthaave! Krooranmaaraaya ashuddha pishaachukkallude pidiyilninnum antareekshatthile adrshya shathrukkallude vanchakasamoohatthilninnum samrakshikkappettu jeevanullllavarude vaasasthhalangallil chennetthuvaan thakkavannam ee aathmaavine nee kaatthukollllaname. Pithaavum puthranum parishuddhaathmaavumaayullllove! Ee aathmaavu ninte vishuddhanmaarude pattanatthil adhivasikkukayum vedippulllla sthhalatthu ippozhum ennekkum paarkkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Hosho…

content: (kukkiliyon)
(anchaam raagam)

Naathhaa! Ningkaluyartthunnennaathmatthe-haale-
Neeyen sharanam nyaan lajikkaruthe-deveshaa!

Vairikall dambham kaattaruthenmel-haale-
Lajikkaruthe ninnaa-shritharaarum

Lajikkum doshikall vyarththhathayaal-haale-
Kartthaave! Kaattuka nin-paathakalle.

Ariyikkanamenne nin cheruvazhikall-haale-
Neril nayichenne parishee-lippikka.
Baarekmor, shubaho .. Menaolam …
(ekkbo)

Sarvveshaa mashihaa! Vishraantiyumaanandamathum daa-sarkkarullka
Maranam kaikkondonaam nee paathaalla-sthhithare
Naasham theertthezhunnelppippaan saakshaatthaam jeevo-ththhaanangall
Vaagdattham cheythothiya pol aashvaasamavarkkuththhaane nalka.
Sthaumenkaalos…

items.content: Svantaroopatthil namme roopappedutthiya utthamanum, svantamchhaayayil namme nirmmicha srashdaavum, mannu kondu namme menanyundaakkukayum thante neethiyil athilekku thanne namme thirichayaykkukayum krpayode athilninnu veendum uddharikkukayum cheyyunna nirmmithaavum aayavanu sthuthi. Thante daasante shavasamskkaara shushroosha nyangall nirvahikkunna ee samayatthum…. Sthuthiyum bahumaanavum yogyamaakunnu. Bku....

Balavaanum yoddhaavum bhayangkaranum sakalattheyum bharikkunnavanumaaya kartthaave! Ninte kalpanayaal sakalavum undaakukayum, ninte kalpanayaal thanne ellaam azhinyupovukayum cheyyunnu. Thiruvishdaprakaaram thanne jeevanum, avidutthe aamgyatthaal avasaanavum sambhavikkunnu. Daivame! Jeevaghraanavum sakalatthinteyum shvaasavum neeyaakunnu. Ninnilulllla prathyaashayil apakadapoornnamaaya jeevithamaakunna ee thaalkkaalikavideshavaasatthilninnu yaathrayaayi nidrapraapichirikkunna ee daasanil kaniyaname. Ninte aashvaasabhavanangallilekku kadakkuvollam ninte vishuddha senakallaal ivanu sahaayam nalkaname. Mahaakaarunyavaanaaya daivame! Ninte shreshdhatha udikkukayum ninte karthrthvam vellippedukayum ninte paraakramam ariyappedukayum ninnekkurichulllla bhayam ellaavarilumundaakukayum cheyyunnathaaya aa avasaana punaruththhaanadivasatthil maalaakhamaar kaahallanaadam purappeduvikkukayum reeshaimaalaakhamaar attahasikkukayum agnimayanmaarude sakala samghangallum ninte bhayangkarathayude prabhaavatthe kondaadukayum cheyyumpoll raajyangall maanyupovukayum thalasthhaanangall azhinyupovukayum prashamsakkaarude simhaasanangall nashichumarinyupovukayum samvathsarangall chhedikkappedukayum maasangallude samkhyaykku azhivundaakukayum raapakalukall odungippovukayum srshdi muzhuvan shoonyamaayi avasheshikkukayum aakaasham illakukayum sooryan andhakaarappedukayum chandranum nakshathrangallum kaarmeghaavrthamaayittheerukayum cheyyunna samayatth, nee bhayangkaramaaya nilayil aagathanaavukayum prathyakshamaayi kaanappedukayum ellaa bhoobhaagangalleyum athirtthikalleyum bhayatthodum virayalodum nirutthukayum neethimaanmaar aanandikkukayum punyavaanmaar santoshikkukayum prakaashasantaanangallellaavarum ninne ethirelkkuvaanaayi purappedukayum dushdanmaar lajikkukayum vijaatheeyar mlaanavadanaraavukayum dushkkarmmikall naanichunilkkendi varikayum cheyyumpoll, ninte mahimayude simhaasanam orukkappedukayum aanandapradamaaya ninte shabdam ellaa jadangalleyum orumichukoottukayum neethi kopikkukayum agni jvalikkukayum vaall moorchakoottappedukayum andhakaaram vyaapikkukayum naashavum dandanavum vidhikkappedukayum pallukadi kellkkappedukayum utthamanmaar verthirikkappedukayum paapikall shikshaykku vidhikkappedukayum sarvvarudeyum pravrtthikall parasyamaayi parishodhikkappedukayum cheyyunnathaaya aa samayatthu avideyulllla shikshaavidhiyilninnum ee ninte daasante aathmaavine samrakshichukollllaname. Ninte manushyasnehammoolam ivanil karunacheyyaname. Ivan cheythupoyittulllla heenakarmmangalle nee pariganikkaruthe. Ivan cheytha paapangalle nee ormikkayumaruthe. Bhayangkaramaaya ninte nyaayavidhiyil ivane shikshikkaruthe. Ninte krpayilninnu ivan nirodhikkappedukayumaruthe. Ninne snehichittulllla koottatthilninnu ivan verthirikkappeduvaanidayaakaruthe. Ninte karunayin chiraku virichu ivane samrakshichu kollllaname. Ninte divasatthinaayi santoshapoorvvam kaatthirikkunna ninte sakala snehithanmaarum vathsalanmaarum ninnodapekshikkumaaraakaname. Ninte raajyatthinu ivane arhanaakkaname. Mukhapakshamillaatthavanum avanavante pravrtthikallkku thakkapole ellaavarkkum prathiphalam nalkunnavanumaaya neethiyum sathyavumulllla nyaayaadhipathiyaayullllove! Ivan santoshaanandangallode ninte koode manavarayilekku praveshikkukayum ninte karunayeyum krpayeyum sthuthichu paadukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Ninakku ninte pithaavinodum parishuddha roohaayodum koode sthuthi yogyamaakunnu. Hosho....

content: (thakseptho-hoydenmodrolon)

Sthhaa-nabhramshatthaal srshdikallakhilam
Sambhramapoorvvam mariyumpoll
Aadithyanumampilliyum thaarakallum
Prabhayillaathaayu marayunnu.
/tlokam srashdaavin vaakkaal
/tantyaavasthhayiletthunnu
Paade kabarukallillakippillarunnu
Niryaathanmaa-ruyarunnu
Ne-rum neethiyumullkkollllum
Niyathavidhikkaayu vidhigeham praapi-kku-nnu.
Moriyo…

items.content: Kartthaave! Sathyavishvaasatthodum salpravrtthikallodumkoode ee lokatthilninnu yaathra purappettirikkunna vishvaasiyaaya ee sahodarante aathmaavinu nee vimochakanum paapaparihaarakanum aayirikkaname. Ivante aayushkkaalatthu ivan cheythupoyittulllla sakala paapangallum thettukallum mlechchhathakallum anugraha sampoornnamaaya ninte karunaasamudratthil kazhuki vedippaakkaname. Jeevadaayakamaaya ninte daivathvatthinte kalppanayaalum aamgyatthaalum ivane naashatthil ninnum nashvarathayilninnum uddharikkaname. Mahaneeyamaaya ninte shreshdhathayin kalppanayaal ivante dehiyeyum aathmaavineyum vishuddheekarikkaname. Ivanuvendi nyangall anachirikkunna ee dhoopatthaal ivanu paapaparihaaram nalkaname. Karachilo vilaapamo illaattha santoshollaasangallude sthhalatthu ivane aashvasippichukollllaname. Nyangallum vishvaasikallaaya sakala marichupoyavarum ninte valatthubhaagatthu ninnukondu pithrputhraparishuddhaathmaavaaya ninakku sthuthiyum sthothravum karettumaaraakaname, hosho.....

content: (kolo-moraheemin)

Aadamilaa-rambhi-chaayathamaayu mi-shihaayollam
Maranam nee-naallodi
/tmashihaaya-mmaranatthi-nnadhikaaram
/tozhivaakki-paapatthin- munaneekki
Ghoshikku-nnellaa thalamurayum skeeppaayinmel
nediyathaam vijayatthe.

Punaruththhaa-natthil maanyeedum mrthiyodu paapam,
Lajithanaa-kum saatthaan
/tneethiparanmaarellaam modikkum
/tshobhanamaam vasanatthaal bhooshitharaay
Deepikayaa-llichittavaretthum manavaallanumaay
manavaraye pookiduvaan.
Baarekmor. Shubaho ...

Gaathrattho-daathmaavothunnu sasamaadhaanam
priyasahajaa maruvuka nee
/tpokunnen-ninnarikee-nninneram
/tnikhileshan kalppikkum-sthhaanatthil
Kartthaavil-nyaanaa-shikkunnunduththhaanatthil
Ninne kaanaan veendum.
Menaolam…

Mishihaaraa-jaavin varavingkal doothavaranmaar
Kaahallamoo-thunneram
/tkabarukallum paarakallum polliyumudan
/tmrtharellaa-muththhaanam cheytheedum.
Deepikayaa-llichittavaretthum manavaallanumaayu
Manavaraye pookiduvaan.
(madarosho-thubaulaman)

Nyaayaadhipa naathhaa-ee-shoye!
Vidhivijayam nedu-nno-n dhanyan.

Bhraathaakkanmaare!-sa-shraddham-
Kettarivin ningall-sa-mpatthum
Saundaryavumaajnyaa-sha-kthiyathum
Poyppoyu nishshesham maa-nyeedum
Nithyam vaazhunnon-thaan-dhanyan.

Sodararanyo-nyam mallittu
Maddhye mrthi ve-gam che-nnetthi
Amgangalleye-llaam chhe-dichu
Bhaagam-bhaagam ver-paa-daakki
Kartthaavineyaarnnon-thaan-dhanyan.

Mrthasangketham nyaan-praa-pichu
Modakaram theja-ssa-ngilla
Neeyen thejassaa-vu-ka naathhaa!
Shaashvatha thejasse!-ni-nnaal nyaan
Aanandasthhaanam-praa-pikkum.
(ooneeso-breekku msheeho)

U-ththhaanadine-mrthajanathaykkuyirekee
Sho-bhanagaathram-nalkum msheehaa dhanyan.

He!-mrthigathare-uththhaanam-druthametthum
Khe-dikkendaa-dehatthin-naashatthil
/tsundaramaay-ningalle nirmmichon
/tgaathratthi-nnuththhaanam nalki
Sarvvarkkum-prathidaanam-yogyatha polarulleedum.

Aardratha moolam-paathaallam pooki mrthar-
Kkellaaperkkum-maargam kaanichone!
/taadaamya-rkkuththhaanam nalkaan
/tantyadine-nee vanneedumpoll
Ninnilura-ngum daasa-n anpodu nal-kuka jeevan.

Haa!-snehithare!-mrthidoothan -vannetthi
Ve-gam povaa-navanenne dhrthi kootti
/tparichithare-kandeedaanavano-
/tdanuvaadam-nyaanabhyarththhichu
Yaachanayum-kozhakallum-kaikkondillavanayyo.

Nyaan cheyyunne-ntenpriyare vathsalare!
No-kkeedunnen-pizha enne vidhinilaye,
/tenpaapam-nyaanorkkunnenne
/tava thedum-sambhramamiyalunnen
Anpudayon thanvaravil-krpa cheyvaanarththhippin.

Haa!-sodarare-mrthirachitham-madakaramaam
Ee-paaneeyam-paarkkilaho-bahuthiktham
/tsutharithinaal thaathaneyum jananee-
/tjanakanmaar-vathsalasuthareyum
Orttheedu-nnillithine-niyamichon-vaazhvudayon
Moriyo…
(maar yaakkobinte bovooso)

Dai-vaathmajane! Shaashvatharaajyatthaashvaasam nin
Daa-sannekuka dhaarmmika shuddhanmaarodoppam.

Kallarayinnum mrthareyettittuththhaanatthil
The-jomayamaam vasthram nalkunnone sthothram.

Daivatthaal preshithanaam doothan bheethipradanaam
Shee-ghram preshippicheedumpollettam ghoran.

Paa-pam theendiyoraathmatthe javamingetthikke-
Nnee-renodunnathanaamgyatthaal kalppikkunnu.

Doo-than thaanittekeedunnu mrthiyin shiksha
Thaa-dikkunnu maranaasthratthaal drdhagaathratthe.

Gaa-thramashesham jvaramaam dahanan baadhikkunnu
Vedanayaalasthhikallanyonyam thikkeedunnu.

Sangkadabhaaram chitthatthe haa! Mathhanam cheyyoo-
Mumpil kaaryam sarvvavumonnaayu vanneedunnu.

The-jorandham sundaranethram mangeedunnu
Chundukall randum maranatthin veenyullkkollllunnu.

Ma-nnaalaadaamine nirmmichon thaathan sthuthyan
Krooshin paadaal rakshichonaam puthran vandyan.

Antyam jeevan nalkeettavane makkallodoppam
The-jassaniyicheedum roohaa sthothaarhan thaan.

Kallarayinnum mrthare etteettuththhaanatthil
The-jomayamaam vasthram nalkunnone sthothram.
